Properties.Description: Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
Distance at which the prop starts to fade (<0 = use fademaxdist). If 'Screen Space Fade' is selected, this represents the number of pixels wide covered by the prop when it starts to fade.
Maximum distance at which the prop is visible (0 = don't fade out). If 'Screen Space Fade' is selected, this represents the *minimum* number of pixels wide covered by the prop when it fades.

If you specify a fade in the worldspawn, or if the engine is running under dx7, then the engine will forcibly fade out props even if fademindist/fademaxdist isn't specified. This scale factor gives you some control over the fade. Using 0 here turns off the forcible fades.
The mine not trip or explode but the laser will be on.
The name for this tripmine hack that matches the difficulty values specified in holo_hacking_difficulty.txt.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableShadow
InputOutputs.Description: Turn shadow off.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableShadow
InputOutputs.Description: Turn shadow on.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game.

InputOutputs.Name: OnPlayerPickup
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the player picks up this object

InputOutputs.Name: OnPhysGunDrop
InputOutputs.Description: Dropped by the player or physgun

InputOutputs.Name: OnGlovePulled
InputOutputs.Description: Pulled by the gravity gloves

InputOutputs.Name: AllowTripping
InputOutputs.Description: Allows the mine to be tripped.

InputOutputs.Name: ActivateMine
InputOutputs.Description: Activates mine.

InputOutputs.Name: DeactivateMine
InputOutputs.Description: Deactivates mine.

InputOutputs.Name: OnExplode
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the tripmine explodes

InputOutputs.Name: OnHackStarted
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the hack has been started.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHackStopped
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the hack has been stopped.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHackSuccess
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the hack has been successfully completed.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHackFailed
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the hack has failed.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHackSuccessAnimationComplete
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the hack has been successfully completed and the hacking plug has returned back to its idle position.

InputOutputs.Name: OnPuzzleCompleted
InputOutputs.Description: Fires as soon as the puzzle completes. The hack is still active at this point and has yet to play its outro.

InputOutputs.Name: OnPuzzleSuccess
InputOutputs.Description: Fires as soon as the puzzle completes. The hack is still active at this point and has yet to play its outro.

InputOutputs.Name: OnPuzzleFailed
InputOutputs.Description: Fires as soon as the puzzle completes. The hack is still active at this point and has yet to play its outro.
